Silva RelatedInfo CodeSource changes

0.2

  Features added:

    - Simplified how Authors deal with centered capsules by automatically
      detecting the css class and adding local style that sets the right/left
      margins to auto.  

    - Changed some field names to correspond with the Multi-TOC Code Source
      so the center formatting logic can be reused.

0.1

    Initial public release.
